About Me

01

Who am I ?

Hey devsðŸ‘‹! This is Shivang, a fourth-year student enrolled in a course Bachelor of Technology of branch Computer Science with specialisation in Inernet of Things from Raj Kumar Goel Institute Of Technology, Ghaziabad associated with Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow-INDIA.

Currently working as Trainee Software Engineer in Recruit CRM, where I am skilling myself in building attractive and dynamic SPAs using Vue.js along with a powerful backend support of Laravel framework

Recuit CRM empowers recruitment agencies by sourcing candidates on LinkedIn, sending emails, setting up interviews, reminders, collecting updated CVs & even feedback from clients.

Tech-Intro

My dearest language for analysing algorithms and problem solving is C++ and for development it is Javascript (reason)? its very handy to copy the code from Js libraries: LOL

As a web develper at a glance I had worked upon most popular development stacks of IT Industry like: React | Angular with Node commonly called MERN/MEAN , Vue with Laravel, Blockchain apps using solidity and React.

My powerful tool to interact with blockchain is Solidity it grants me access to create smart contracts. Tbh I am very enthusiastic to explore WEB3 space and learn the core concepts of blockchain with practical implementations.

Work Show Case

02

Blockchain Projects

Code 2 Earn

The P2E based project which is all about that how we can earn while we Code. Every coder either beginner or expert will get Crypto tokens( ex- ERC-721 ) everytime on completion of a particular task. Idea is to collaborate with a coding company with this approach and increase the usability of Web3 with Web2.


take a look

Destruction 100

This is a NFT-based game in which we buy NFTs as an avatar to fight with another avator which is refered as Boss in our game.

Full Stack Development Projects

Issue Tracker System

Users can raise any issue facing in their organization by raising a ticket to a specific resolver department team, these issues will be resolved or rejected by resolvers which belongs to the same department of issued-ticket.Admin will keep an eye on all of the processes like: no. of tickets resolved, no. of pending tickets etc, and is responsible for managing resolvers account.
Technologies Used: Vue.js | Laravel | MySQL


take a look

Job Portal

Candidates can find thier favorite job from list of all available jobs in the database. Recruiters can post thier job on the application and can get job-application of candidates whoever has applied for a job
Technologies Used: Laravel


take a look

Ticket Management System

Users can raise any issue facing in their organization by raising a ticket to a specific resolver department team, these issues will be resolved or rejected by resolvers which belongs to the same department of issued-ticket.Admin will keep an eye on all of the processes like: no. of tickets resolved, no. of pending tickets etc, and is responsible for managing resolvers account.
Technologies Used: MERN


take a look

Shoeman

An online shopping project where user can place an order of thier fav item and also can see its status.
Technologies Used: MERN
